associate.associateHint:
Once a joint wallet is enabled, the joint wallet can draw on the wallet’s “available assets”
to cover gas fees. A wallet can add multiple joint wallets,
although each user can only serve as a joint wallet to one account.

CampaignNode.mortgage_hint1: *This is a signature account for mining without any rewards. The rewards will go to your current wallet
CampaignNode.mortgage_hint2: *You can only have one signature account.

tip.tip1: matrix.io does not hold your keys for you.We cannot access accounts, recover keys, reset passwords, nor reverse transactions.
tip.tip2: Protect your keys and always ensure that you are on the intended URL.
tip.tip3: You are responsible for your security.

medical.tittle1: The AI-assisted diagnosis system will provide diagnosis analysis for CT scans of lungs,
medical.tittle2: The system was trained on results by labeled by experts from several top hospitals
medical.future: Lung CT scans, as well as many other services, will be supported in the future.
medical.pose1: Pose detection is an important branch of computer vision, with valuable applications in detecting actions
medical.pose2: human-machine interactions, gaming, animation and more.
medical.pose3: Try it out and stay tuned for more new features in the future!
medical.obj: Object detection can quickly and accurately generate automatic text labeling for objects in a photograph.

offline.offLineTransferHint: Offline transafers allow you to be offline when you unlock your wallet (by uploading a private key or keystore). This way, security is improved as your private key or keystore is not exposed to the network.

digAccount.tips3: 3、验证是否满足相应的节点对MAN数量的要求已抵押的数量+活期抵押+定期抵押
